'''James Grout''' ([[1927]] - [[2012]]<ref>{{webcite|author=Lewis Cowen|articleurl=http://www.thisiswiltshire.co.uk/news/9800462.Malmesbury_actor_James_Grout_dies__aged_84/|articlename=Malmesbury actor James Grout dies, aged 84|dated=5-July-2012|website=thisiswiltshire.co.uk|accessed=5-July-2012}}</ref>) is a Tony Award-nominated British actor. 

==Roles==
* [[1981]]: [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1981 radio series)]]: [[Barliman Butterbur]]
* [[1992]]: [[Tales from the Perilous Realm (1992 radio series)|''Tales from the Perilous Realm'' (1992 radio series)]]: [[Nokes]]
